product_data: A trendy 6.22-inch Halo FullView™ Display gives Y91C 2020 a further enhanced viewing experience with a screen-to-body ratio of 88.6%, even higher than its predecessor, by redesigning the notch. In addition to a smart design, smart hand gesture controls makes using this large display effortless.

Y12 features a 6.35-inch Halo FullView™ Display with a 19.3:9 aspect ratio. Super narrow bezels on all sides stretch the screen-to-body ratio to 89%, creating a flagship-standard visual impact. Plus, enjoying such a broad view with only one hand is effortless, thanks to specifically designed gesture controls.

VIVO Mobile S1 PRO - Mystic Black
product_data: Starting our style journey from S1, we take the style quotient one step higher. Taking inspirations from fine jewelry and royal palaces, we managed to break away from squares and circles and created a new unique diamond shaped camera panel. The refreshing Diamond design adds a unique symmetry to the finely crafted back panel completing the distinctive look of S1 Pro. The 2 beautiful colors complete the look and make S1Pro the style icon you love to flaunt.

S1 features Halo FullView™ Display with a high screen-to-body ratio. Its perfect symmetry provides a fantastic visual effect. A 6.38-inch* Super AMOLED Display with a 19.5:9 aspect ratio and the screen-to-body ratio of 89.98% allow you to enjoy a full view without boundaries.

product_name: VIVO Mobile V15 6.53" Smartphone - Topaz Blue
product_data: Embark on an extraordinary visual journey with V15. Its Ultra FullView™ Display achieves a 90.95% screen-to-body ratio that eliminates all obstructions to create the ultimate viewing experience. At the phone’s back, a refreshing color gradient adds to the wonder, with the combination of 3D curves and Spectrum Ripple Design making a bold statement, and delivering on Vivo’s promise to constantly push the limits of smartphone design.

VIVO Mobile V15 Pro 6.39" Smartphone - Topaz Blue
product_data: Vivo's Ultra FullView™ Display is back with V15Pro. At 16.23cm (6.39), the 19.5:9 Super AMOLED display produces an awe-inspiring visual design, utterly seamless from end-to-end. With the earpiece, light and proximity sensors all concealed from view, the side and top bezels have been reduced to just 1.75mm and 2.22mm respectively, resulting in a maximized screen-to-body ratio of 91.64%. It's the groundbreaking visual experience you've been waiting for.
